import React from "react"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import Card from "./card"; import Navbar from "./Navbar"; function Shop({ onBuy, purchasedItems }) { const items = [ { pic: "./mountbike.jpg", title: "Mountain Bike", para: "A fully functional Mountain Bike." }, { pic: "./redbike.jpg", title: "A Red Bike", para: "An unused functional Normal Red Bicycle." }, { pic: "./mouse.jpg", title: "A Mouse", para: "A fully functional unused Wireless Mouse." }, { pic: "./adidas.jpg", title: "Sneakers", para: "Upgrade your footwear collection with our brand-new sneakers." }, { pic: "./bed.jpg", title: "A Bed", para: "Get this comfortable bed." }, { pic: "./controller.jpg", title: "A Controller", para: "A functional game controller." }, { pic: "./twocontrollers.jpg", title: "Controllers", para: "Two brand new gaming controllers." }, { pic: "./whitecontrollers.jpg", title: "White Colored Controllers", para: "A brand new white colored controllers." }, { pic: "./mountbiketwo.jpg", title: "Mount Bike", para: "A fully functional Mountain Bike." }, { pic: "./mountbikethree.jpg", title: "Bike", para: "A fully functional Mountain Bike." }, { pic: "./comphotab.jpg", title: "PC, Tablet and CellPhone", para: "Buy PC, Tablet and CellPhone for an unbelievable price." } ]; return( <>
) } export default Shop;
